JetModiferBase Class Reference

#include <JetModifierBase.h>

Detailed Description

A base class for tool acting on a single jet, implementing IJetModifier by looping over ISingleJetModifier.

This class provides a default implementation for modify(JetContainer&) which simply loops over the container and calls modify(Jet&)
